person.persName: Thomas Hardeman Mayes (Graves County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of Robert Chappell Mayes and Agnes Thweat Locke Mayes. Married to Susan Elizabeth Marquess Mayes in Christian County, Kentucky, on December 1, 1834. Father of Thomas Franklin Mayes, Robert Chappel Mayes, George W. Mayes, Harriet A. Mayes, William Marquess Mayes, Eugene Mayes, Elizabeth Mayes, Richard L. Mayes, Catherine Mayes, and Emma Mayes. Farmer in Graves County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Graves County in 1850. Farmer in Graves County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Graves County in 1860.
